name: Kawaii Karnage (Beta)
description:
Note: This game is only a Beta and is currently a work in progress. This may mean glitches may occur and not all content will appear in the final game if it is released as a full game.

This game was built with Unreal Engine 4.

This game requires an Xbox Controller to play.

Are you sick of saccharine kart racers filled with so much sugar that it burns your eyes without any spice mixed in to balance it out? Kawaii Karnage may be the cinnamon kick of a game for you.  

Blaze around the track as you leave your enemies in the sugary dust with an array of items. Though every so often, this sweet little world will show its true colours and you'll be gifted with mounted weapons to use to blast away at your enemies.

Controls:

Right Trigger: Accelerate

Left Trigger: Brake/Reverse

Left Control Stick: Steer / Navigate Menu

Right Bumper: Weapon Use  (Not available)

B: Decline

A: Accept

Start Button: Pause

Features:

- 4 Playable and Totally Adorable Characters (Currently not fully available)

- 2 Race Tracks to zip, rip and tear through! (If released as a full title, more tracks will be made.)

- An array of crazy weapons and items to utterly destroy your rivals. (Coming soon)

- 2 Player Local Multiplayer (Currently No Online Multiplayer)
